/* Python wrapper */
static PyObject *__pyx_pw_7pyorama_8graphics_16graphics_manager_15GraphicsManager_7window_delete(PyObject *__pyx_v_self, PyObject *__pyx_arg_window); /*proto*/
static PyMethodDef __pyx_mdef_7pyorama_8graphics_16graphics_manager_15GraphicsManager_7window_delete = {"window_delete", (PyCFunction)__pyx_pw_7pyorama_8graphics_16graphics_manager_15GraphicsManager_7window_delete, METH_O, 0};
static PyObject *__pyx_pw_7pyorama_8graphics_16graphics_manager_15GraphicsManager_7window_delete(PyObject *__pyx_v_self, PyObject *__pyx_arg_window) {
  __pyx_t_7pyorama_4core_6handle_Handle __pyx_v_window;
  PyObject *__pyx_r = 0;
  __Pyx_RefNannyDeclarations

/* Python wrapper */
static PyObject *__pyx_pw_7pyorama_8graphics_16graphics_manager_15GraphicsManager_19vertex_format_delete(PyObject *__pyx_v_self, PyObject *__pyx_arg_format); /*proto*/
static PyMethodDef __pyx_mdef_7pyorama_8graphics_16graphics_manager_15GraphicsManager_19vertex_format_delete = {"vertex_format_delete", (PyCFunction)__pyx_pw_7pyorama_8graphics_16graphics_manager_15GraphicsManager_19vertex_format_delete, METH_O, 0};
static PyObject *__pyx_pw_7pyorama_8graphics_16graphics_manager_15GraphicsManager_19vertex_format_delete(PyObject *__pyx_v_self, PyObject *__pyx_arg_format) {
  __pyx_t_7pyorama_4core_6handle_Handle __pyx_v_format;
  PyObject *__pyx_r = 0;
  __Pyx_RefNannyDeclarations
  __Pyx_RefNannySetupContext("vertex_format_delete (wrapper)", 0);
  assert(__pyx_arg_format); {
    __pyx_v_format = __Pyx_PyInt_As_uint64_t(__pyx_arg_format); if (unlikely((__pyx_v_format == ((uint64_t)-1)) && PyErr_Occurred())) __PYX_ERR(0, 312, __pyx_L3_error)
  }

static PyObject *__pyx_pf_7pyorama_8graphics_16graphics_manager_15GraphicsManager_58shader_delete(struct __pyx_obj_7pyorama_8graphics_16graphics_manager_GraphicsManager *__pyx_v_self, __pyx_t_7pyorama_4core_6handle_Handle __pyx_v_shader) {

+1334:     cdef void _mesh_batch_update(self, Handle batch) except *:
static void __pyx_f_7pyorama_8graphics_16graphics_manager_15GraphicsManager__mesh_batch_update(CYTHON_UNUSED struct __pyx_obj_7pyorama_8graphics_16graphics_manager_GraphicsManager *__pyx_v_self, CYTHON_UNUSED __pyx_t_7pyorama_4core_6handle_Handle __pyx_v_batch) {

  __Pyx_RefNannySetupContext("_mesh_batch_update", 0);

  /* function exit code */
  __Pyx_RefNannyFinishContext();
}

 1335:         pass
 1336:         """
 1337:         cdef:
 1338:             SpriteBatchC *batch_ptr
 1339:             SpriteC *sprite_ptr
 1340:             size_t i, j, index
 1341:             Vec4C[6] vertex_tex_coord
 1342:             VertexFormatC *v_fmt_ptr
 1343:             uint8_t *vbo
 1344:             uint8_t *ibo
 1345:             size_t vbo_size, ibo_size
 1346:             uint8_t *vbo_index
 1347:             uint8_t *ibo_index
 1348:             
 1349:         vertex_tex_coord = [
 1350:             Vec4C(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0),
 1351:             Vec4C(1.0, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0),
 1352:             Vec4C(0.0, 1.0, 0.0, 1.0),
 1353:             Vec4C(0.0, 1.0, 0.0, 1.0),
 1354:             Vec4C(1.0, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0),
 1355:             Vec4C(1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0),
 1356:         ]
 1357:         v_fmt_ptr = self.vertex_format_get_ptr(self.v_fmt_sprite)
 1358:         batch_ptr = self.sprite_batch_get_ptr(batch)
 1359:         vbo_size = v_fmt_ptr.stride * 6 * batch_ptr.num_sprites
 1360:         ibo_size = 6 * batch_ptr.num_sprites * sizeof(uint32_t)
 1361:         vbo = <uint8_t *>calloc(1, vbo_size)
 1362:         if vbo == NULL:
 1363:             raise MemoryError("SpriteBatch: cannot allocate temporary vertex buffer memory")
 1364:         ibo = <uint8_t *>calloc(1, ibo_size)
 1365:         if ibo == NULL:
 1366:             raise MemoryError("SpriteBatch: cannot allocate temporary index buffer memory")
 1367:         for i in range(batch_ptr.num_sprites):
 1368:             sprite_ptr = self.sprite_get_ptr(batch_ptr.sprites[i])
 1369:             for j in range(6):
 1370:                 index = 6 * i + j
 1371:                 vbo_index = vbo + (index * v_fmt_ptr.stride)
 1372:                 memcpy(vbo_index + 0, &vertex_tex_coord[j], sizeof(Vec4C))
 1373:                 memcpy(vbo_index + sizeof(Vec4C), &sprite_ptr.position, sizeof(Vec2C))
 1374:                 memcpy(vbo_index + sizeof(Vec4C) + sizeof(Vec2C), &sprite_ptr.z_index, sizeof(float))
 1375:                 memcpy(vbo_index + sizeof(Vec4C) + sizeof(Vec3C), &sprite_ptr.rotation, sizeof(float))
 1376:                 memcpy(vbo_index + (2 * sizeof(Vec4C)), &sprite_ptr.width, sizeof(float))
 1377:                 memcpy(vbo_index + (2 * sizeof(Vec4C)) + sizeof(float), &sprite_ptr.height, sizeof(float))
 1378:                 memcpy(vbo_index + (2 * sizeof(Vec4C)) + sizeof(Vec2C), &sprite_ptr.scale, sizeof(Vec2C))
 1379:                 memcpy(vbo_index + (3 * sizeof(Vec4C)), &sprite_ptr.tint, sizeof(Vec3C))
 1380:                 memcpy(vbo_index + (3 * sizeof(Vec4C)) + sizeof(Vec3C), &sprite_ptr.alpha, sizeof(float))
 1381:                 memcpy(vbo_index + (4 * sizeof(Vec4C)), &sprite_ptr.anchor, sizeof(Vec2C))
 1382:                 ibo_index = ibo + (index * sizeof(uint32_t))
 1383:                 memcpy(ibo_index, &index, sizeof(uint32_t))
 1384:         self.vertex_buffer_set_data(batch_ptr.vertex_buffer, <uint8_t[:vbo_size]>vbo)
 1385:         self.index_buffer_set_data(batch_ptr.index_buffer, <uint8_t[:ibo_size]>ibo)
 1386:         free(vbo)
 1387:         free(ibo)
